org.apache.logging.log4j.message

Class SimpleMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.message.SimpleMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.CharSequence, Message, StringBuilderFormattable

    public class SimpleMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Message, StringBuilderFormattable, java.lang.CharSequence
    The simplest possible implementation of Message. It just returns the String given as the constructor argument.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
